revised_title: Determination of Young's and Shear Moduli in Cortical Bone
tldr: This study determined the Young's and shear moduli of cortical bone from various animals using three-point bending tests. The main determinant of mechanical properties was found to be the mineral content. The ratio of Young's modulus to shear modulus was approximately 20:1, indicating the importance of controlled crack propagation in protecting hollow bones from failure due to local impact.
